thread.title: TV | The Celts: Blood, Iron, and Sacrifice
thread.title_full: TV | The Celts: Blood, Iron, and Sacrifice - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: TV | The Celts: Blood, Iron, and Sacrifice
text: In this new series, anthropologist Alice Roberts and archaeologist Neil Oliver explore the origins and beliefs of the ancient group of peoples. They begin by examining the origins of the Celts in the Alps of Central Europe and the moment they first came into contact with the Romans, and started one of the pivotal battles that would shape Europe forever. Or so we think, we'll be honest, we remember little from the Leaving Cert history paper, but this sounds awful interesting. Time for a refresher course we think.
